attributes.action: Remove Michael Martin  as speaker of the House of Commons immediately
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Michael Martin has displayed utter contempt towards the British (tax paying) public,not only in his own extravagant expense claims but, also in his defense of the many dubious claims by seemingly morally bankrupt M.P.s'. 
Help restore faith by removing him (and them).

rejection.details: Speaker Michael Martin announced on May 19 he will step down in June.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
